DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the effects of chronic elevated levels of Prolactin on metabolism and insulin sensitivity by studying patients with hyperprolactinemia before and after treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Substrate Metabolism and Insulin Sensitivity in Patients With Hyperprolactinemia Before and After Treatment
DOC.criteria: Written consent Age between 18 and 70 At diagnose a serum prolactin > 200 microgram/l (10 U/l) Hypothyroidism Use of any medication Pregnancy
